comment-list.a11y-filter-correct: Filters all comments marked as correct
comment-list.a11y-filter-wrong: Filters all comments marked as wrong
comment-list.comment-stream-stopped: The comment stream has been stopped.
comment-list.comment-stream-started: The comment stream has been started.

comment-page.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to create a comment, key 2 to go to the user menu. As soon as several comments are available you can search and filter comments. Press key 3 to search in the comments list, key 4 to sort comments, key 5 to filter comments, key 6 to start or continue the comment stream, key 7 to go to the first comment, key 0 to return to the session overview or press the escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-keys-moderation: As soon as there are multiple comments you can search and filter comments. Press key 1 to search the comments, key 2 to go to the user menu, key 3 to sort comments, key 4 to go to the first comment, key 5 to go to the public comment list, key 0 to go back to the session overview or the Escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-message: You are now on the comments page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-message-moderation: You are now on the moderation page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-comment-grade: Marks this comment as a bonus comment
comment-page.a11y-comment-banish: Bans this comment from the public comment list
comment-page.a11y-comment-reject: Puts this comment back on the public comment list
comment-page.a11y-comment-not-marked-wrong: Marks this comment as not correct
comment-page.a11y-comment-answered: Go to your answer of this comment
comment-page.a11y-text-correct: This comment was marked as correct.
comment-page.a11y-text-grade: This comment was marked as a bonus comment.
comment-page.a11y-text-read: This comment was discussed in full view on the beamer.
comment-page.a11y-text-wrong: The comment was answered in the negative.
comment-page.a11y-message-answer: You are now on the comment answer page. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
comment-page.a11y-keys-answer: Press the key 1 to write an answer or go to your answer, the key 2 to go to the user menu, the key 0 to return to the comment page or the Escape key to repeat this announcement.
comment-page.a11y-enter-answer: Enter an answer to this comment here.
comment-page.a11y-entered-answer: You have answered the comment with {{answer}}.
comment-page.a11y-delete-answer: Deletes your answer to this comment
comment-page.a11y-save-answer: Saves your answer to this comment
comment-page.a11y-edit-answer: Option to edit the answer for this comment
comment-page.a11y-rejected: moved back to the public comment list.
comment-page.comment: Comment {{ comment }} was asked at {{ time }} and has currently {{ votes }}. {{correct}} {{wrong}} {{bonus}} {{beamer}} {{answer}}
comment-page.mark-read: Discussed by you in full screen mode on the projector
comment-page.new-comment: A new comment with the content, {{ comment }}, has been asked.
comment-page.search-box-input-description: Here you can search for comment.

content.a11y-content-create-message: You can now create a new question. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call up the announcement later via the Escape key.
content.a11y-content-create-keys: Press key 1 to enter the topic of your new question, key 2 to enter the user menu, key 3 to change the question format, key 0 to return to the session view or the escape key to repeat this announcement.
content.a11y-enter-subject: Enter the topic of the question here and then press Tab twice to enter the question.
content.a11y-enter-body: Enter the question here and then press Tab to get to the selection of the question collection. Note: This text field supports text formatting with markdown.
content.a11y-enter-content-group: Use the arrow keys to select one of your content groups or crate a new one by entering.
content.a11y-enter-answer: Enter a new answer here and press the tab key to add it.
content.a11y-enter-another-answer: Enter another answer or go back to select right and wrong answers.
content.a11y-answer-checkbox: Use the space bar to determine whether the answer {{answer}} is right or wrong.
content.a11y-format-info: You can choose between the four different question formats, 'Choice', 'Likert', 'Yes/No' and 'Text'. Use the arrow keys to switch between the formats.
content.a11y-single-choice: Currently you've chosen the format Single-Choice. Switch to multiple-choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-multiple-choice: Currently you've chosen the format multiple choice. Switch to Single-Choice with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-yes: Currently the answer to this question is 'Yes'. Change to 'No' with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-answer-no: Currently the answer to this question is 'No'. Change to 'Yes' with the arrow keys.
content.a11y-submit: Creates the entered question with the subject {{subject}}.
content.at-least-one: In multiple choice mode you have to select at least 1 true answer.
content.need-answers: Please add at least two answers.
content.no-empty: No empty fields allowed. Please check subject and body.
content.only-one: In single choice mode is only 1 true answer allowed.
content.max-answers: There's a maximum of eight answers.
content.same-answer: Same answer label is not allowed.
content.select-one: In single choice mode you have to select 1 true answer.
content.subject: Subject
content.submitted: Content submitted. Ready for creation of new content.
content.content-group-update-failed: Something went wrong. Maybe the collection is already present?
content.format-info: You can choose between the four different question formats 'Choice', 'Likert', 'Yes/No' and 'Text'.
content.md-info: In this input field text formatting with Markdown is supported.
content.loose-contents-description: Here you can see questions which have not been assigned to a collection yet. Add single questions to an existing or a new collection or create a new collection containing all loose questions.

feedback.a11y-message: You are now in live survey mode. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or use the Escape key to call up the announcement later.
feedback.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to find out the status of the current survey, key 2 to go to the user menu, key 3 to start and stop the survey, key 4 to change the type of the survey, key 0 to return to the session overview or the Escape key to repeat this announcement.
feedback.a11y-status: Currently the survey is {{status}}. {{state0}} percent have selected answer 1, {{state1}} percent have selected answer 2, {{state2}} percent have selected answer 3, {{state3}} percent have selected answer 4.
feedback.a11y-status-changed: The survey has been {{status}}. Press enter to {{nextStatus}} the survey.

room-page.a11y-moderation: Opens all comments selected by the moderator
room-page.a11y-comments: Opens all questions asked about the session
room-page.a11y-settings: Navigates to the settings where you can manage the session and its comments and add moderators or categories.
room-page.a11y-statistics: Opens the statistics for your question collections.
room-page.a11y-keys: Press key 1 to go to the comments overview, key 2 to open the user menu, key 3 to go to the moderation overview, key 4 to create a new question, key 5 to go to the live feedback, key 6 to navigate through your question collections, key 7 to navigate to the statistics, key 8 to make settings to the session, key 9 to show a qr-code for the current session, key 0 to go to the back button, or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-room-message: You're now in your session {{session}} with the key {{key}}. To get information about key combinations press the Enter key or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-create-content: Opens a form to create new questions.
room-page.a11y-content-groups: In this session there are {{count} Question collections. Tab between them and press Enter to edit questions or settings in the collection.
room-page.a11y-no-content-groups: There are no questions in this session yet. Press key 4 to create a new question.
room-page.a11y-moderator-message: You are now in the session {{session}}, which you are moderating. To get information about key combinations, press the Enter key now or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
room-page.a11y-moderator-keys: Press key 1 to go to the comments overview, key 2 to open the user menu, key 3 to go to the moderation overview, key 0 to go to the back button or key 9 to repeat this announcement.
room-page.a11y-moderation-disabled: This session is currently not moderated.
room-page.a11y-qr-code: Opens a dialog box that displays the session link as QR code.
room-page.room-loading-error: The session could not be loaded

settings.a11y-add-moderator: Add the entered User as Moderator
settings.a11y-moderator-email: Enter the email of the user you want to add as a moderator
settings.a11y-room-name: Give the session a new name here.
settings.a11y-direct-send: Slider to send comments directly to participant
settings.a11y-threshold: Slider for setting the threshold for visible comments
settings.a11y-room-description: Enter a description for the session
settings.moderator-not-found: No user was found with this E-Mail.
settings.question: Question
settings.tokens-deleted: All tokens of this sessions have been deleted.
settings.no-bonus: No bonus points have been given yet.
settings.threshold-info: If a threshold value is set, only comments that have received a higher rating are displayed.
settings.direct-send-info: If this setting is deactivated, a moderator or the lecturer must activate new comments before they become publicly visible.

statistic.a11y-message-overview: You are now on the statistics overview. Press the Enter key to get information about key combinations or call the announcement later with the Escape key.
statistic.a11y-message-evaluation: You are now in the evaluation of the question {{content}}. Navigate trough the answers with the tab key or the press key 0 to return to the statistics overview.
statistic.a11y-keys-overview: Press the Tab key to select the question collection. Then navigate through the results of the collection. Press key 2 to go to the user menu, key 0 to go back to the session overview or the Escape key to repeat this announcement.
statistic.a11y-group-progress: {{percent}} percent of the questions in the collection {{group}} were answered correctly.
statistic.a11y-content-result: The question {{content}} has been answered by {{count}} persons so far, {{abstentions}} persons have abstained.
statistic.a11y-choice-result: The question was answered correctly by {{percent}} percent.
statistic.a11y-go-to-statistic: Press the Enter key to get to the evaluation of the question.

dialog.cancel-description: Cancels the current process and closes the dialog.
dialog.really-reset-form: Do you really want to reset all inputs?
